scripts.sendTestEvent: curl -m 70 -X POST https://us-central1-pub-verse-app.cloudfunctions.net/nodejs-moderator-function -H "Authorization: bearer $(gcloud auth print-identity-token)" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "ce-id: 1234567890" -H "ce-specversion: 1.0" -H "ce-type: google.cloud.pubsub.topic.v1.messagePublished" -H "ce-time: 2020-08-08T00:11:44.895529672Z" -H "ce-source: //pubsub.googleapis.com/projects/pub-verse-app/topics/nostr-events" -d '{  "message": {"data": ""}}'
